summary: Water quality is stable but trending towards lower temperatures and higher pH levels.

insights.recommendation: Monitor pH closely; consider adding pH stabilizers if it continues to rise.
Check for any sources of contamination; consider water changes if TDS continues to rise.
Ensure water temperature remains within optimal range for tilapia (24-28°C); consider heating if it drops further.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.033 / 7.005 / 7.106 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 333.157 / 307.8 / 342.5 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 24.337 / 20.94 / 29.62 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
